name: goboscript
description: Text-based language that compiles to Scratch projects. Enables complex, versionable workflows while remaining compatible with Scratch's visual runtime.

name: Nixite
description: Generates unattended Linux install scripts. Automatically selects optimal methods and minimizes prompts for fast system bootstrap.

name: tshu
description: Python library for safe, cross-platform shell execution. Uses t-strings and a Rust-backed bash implementation.

name: musync
description: Batch copy, rename, and convert lossless audio. Optimized pipeline for producing high-quality MP3 output.

name: msglint
description: Fast commit message linter. Enforces format and conventions before changes enter version control.

name: neocities-sync
description: Deploys projects to Neocities with minimal API usage. Suitable for Vite, Astro, and Next.js builds.

name: instax
description: Generates realistic instant-camera prints. Exports dimension-accurate guides for original Instax film.
